sentences.en: An institution that trains candidates for ministry or the priesthood; a theological seminary.
sentences.cn: 培养神职人员或牧师的机构; 神学研究班.

sentences.en: Augustine's Seminary, and was ordained as a priest in 1991 for the archdiocese of Toronto.
sentences.cn: 吴神父在一九九一年晋升神父圣品职位,为多伦多总教区服务,牧养天主子民.

sentences.en: Fuller Theological Seminary in Pasadena, California, is one of the largest in North America.
sentences.cn: 加利福尼亚州的帕萨迪纳的福乐神学院是北美最大的神学院之一.

sentences.en: George graduated from Bethel Seminary San Diego in 2005.
sentences.cn: 他本人于2005年从伯特利神学院毕业.

sentences.en: House : God ever talk to you when you were in the seminary?

sentences.en: I vacillated for a long time between medicine and seminary .

sentences.en: No seminary in the ELCA (Evangelical Lutheran Church in America)teaches the virgin birth of Christ, the miracles of the Bible, or the physical resurrection of Jesus as historical fact. ical fact.

sentences.en: One Dallas professor was speaker at Westminster Seminary's graduation ceremony.

sentences.en: She also has taught at Fuller Theological Seminary and United Theological Seminary.
sentences.cn: 她也在福乐神学和联合神学院教书.

sentences.en: She called it the Buckland Female Seminary.
sentences.cn: 她称这所学校为马克兰德女子学校.

The seminary is of enormous symbolic importance.

sentences.en: Where will you go when the seminary closes?
